forums.title: Official Keen Games
forums.description: Here, you can get help with anything about official Commander Keen games.

forums.title: Unofficial Keen Games
forums.description: You can discuss anything about unofficial Commander Keen games here.

forums.title: Other Keen Stuff
forums.description: This is where you can post your Commander Keen related stories, artwork, or other stuff that is related to Commander Keen but doesn't belong in another forum.

forums.title: Release Forum
forums.description: Here is where to post about the latest Commander Keen fangame or modification you finished, a new website you made, or another Keen-related creation.

forums.title: Keen Voting Booth
forums.description: Here, you can post polls to assess people's opinions on Keen-related subjects.

forums.title: Miscellaneous
forums.description: Here you can post anything that doesn't belong in another forum.

forums.title: Miscellaneous Polls
forums.description: This is the place to post polls that don't pertain to the subject of Keen.

forums.title: The Theater
forums.description: Discuss your favorite books, movies, and music here or just lounge around and see what other people think is classy.

forums.title: The Classics
forums.description: Discuss classic computer or console games.
